description: InfluxDB dashboards for telegraf metrics + netdata PSI

targets.query: SELECT last("committed_as") / last("total") * 100 FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") - 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" =~ /^$cpu$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu" fill(linear)

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s)*count(read_bytes)/count(read_bytes) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s)*count(write_bytes)/count(write_bytes) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 *count(bytes_recv)/count(bytes_recv) as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8*count(bytes_sent)/count(bytes_sent) as "out"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(null)
SELECT mean(load1) as short,mean(load5) as medium,mean(load15) as long FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("value") FROM "netdata.system.io_full_pressure.full_10" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT mean(load1) as short,mean(load5) as medium,mean(load15) as long FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(running) as running, mean(blocked) as blocked, mean(sleeping) as sleeping, mean(stopped) as stopped, mean(zombies) as zombies, mean(paging) as paging, mean(unknown) as unknown FROM "processes" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(context_switches),1s)*count(context_switches)/count(context_switches) as "context switches"  FROM "kernel" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(processes_forked),1s)*count(processes_forked)/count(processes_forked) as forks FROM "kernel" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("file-max") as max FROM "linux_sysctl_fs" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("file-nr") as opened FROM "linux_sysctl_fs" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ and cpu = '$cpu' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_estabresets), 1s)*count(tcp_estabresets)/count(tcp_estabresets) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_outrsts), 1s)*count(tcp_outrsts)/count(tcp_outrsts) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_activeopens), 1s)*count(tcp_activeopens)/count(tcp_activeopens) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(tcp_passiveopens), 1s)*count(tcp_passiveopens)/count(tcp_passiveopens) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("TcpExtSyncookiesFailed"), 1s) *count(TcpExtSyncookiesFailed)/count(TcpExtSyncookiesFailed) FROM "nstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("TcpExtSyncookiesRecv"), 1s) FROM "nstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_indatagrams), 1s)*count(udp_indatagrams)/count(udp_indatagrams) as "in datagrams" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(udp_outdatagrams), 1s)*count(udp_outdatagrams)/count(udp_outdatagrams) as "out datagrams" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8*count(bytes_recv)/count(bytes_recv) as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8*count(bytes_sent)/count(bytes_sent) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s)*count(packets_recv)/count(packets_recv) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s)*count(packets_sent)/count(packets_sent) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) * count(drop_in)/count(drop_in) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host,interface fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) * count(drop_out)/count(drop_out) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host,interface fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) * count(err_in)/count(err_in) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host,interface fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) * count(err_out)/count(err_out) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /^$server/ AND interface =~ /^$netif/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host,interface fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("in")) * count("in")/count("in") as "in", non_negative_derivative(mean("out")) * count("out")/count("out") as "out" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used) as "used", mean(total) as "total" FROM "swap" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) * count(reads)/count(reads) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) * count(writes)/count(writes) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) * count(read_bytes)/count(read_bytes) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) * count(write_bytes)/count(write_bytes) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) * count(read_time)/count(read_time) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) * count(write_time)/count(write_time) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "name" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), *
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(inodes_used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/  AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(inodes_free) + mean(inodes_used) as "total" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/  AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "path"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/
list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/
list.label: CPU
list.name: cpu
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "cpu" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/
list.label: Disk
list.name: disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/
list.label: Network interface
list.name: netif
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /^$server$/

title: System Dashboard (Telegraf + Netdata)
